item.description:
Good Afternoon Socialites,

Please join us at MATCH, Thursday, August 06, 2009 at 6:30 pm. This modern restaurant/lounge located on the corner of Newbury Street and Mass. Ave maintains an unpretentious yet hip vibe. A sleek fire display and glass wine room are just two of its many features. Match's signature mini burgers and martinis are guaranteed to please the most discriminating palate. Match also features an array of appetizers and entr√©es.

Every Thursday night, from 5:00pm to 10:00pm is Ladies Night! All entrees are only $5.00!! I have been dining at MATCH for years, this is a STEAL! Ultra Chic ~ Ultra Sexy

RSVP!!

Match Burgers and Martinis

Location:94 Massachusettes Avenue, Boston MA, 02215

Phone: (617) 247-9922
Hours of Operation: Dinner: Sunday - Wednesday: 5:00pm - 10:00pm, Thursday - Saturday: 5:00pm - 11:00pm
Payment Options:
AMEX, Diners Club, MasterCard, Visa

Public Transit: Hynes Convention Center T-stop on the Green Line.

Parking: Valet

Parking Details: Valet parking is available in front of the restaurant at $15 per car.
item.name: Match Burgers and Martinis
